sub_title: Senior Researcher/Head of Department bij KNAW Humanities Cluster
summary: Historian of science, art, and ideas. Key words: material culture, heritage, reconstruction research, digital humanities research methods. Senior Researcher at NL-Lab, KNAW Humanities Cluster, principal investigator at www.artdatis.nl, research group leader at www.gloknos.ac.uk (University of Cambridge), president at www.gewina.nl, coordinator Visual and Material Culture Research Network at www.huizingainstituut.nl.

treasury_media: [{'url': None, 'title': 'Elegant Anatomy. The Eighteenth-Century Leiden Anatomical Collections.', 'description': 'This book is based on my PhD thesis. It offers an account of the material culture of the eighteenth-century Leiden anatomical collections, which have not been studied in detail before. The author introduces the novel analytical concept of aesthesis, as these historical medical collections may seem strange, and undeniably have a morbid aesthetic, yet are neither curiosities nor art. Available via  http://www.brill.com/products/book/elegant-anatomy', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C512DAQHfQcfMgt-6_Q/profile-treasury-image-shrink_800_800/0/1597460253629?e=1692939600&v=beta&t=TmPjqcKG7BZoucubpjVyMFzexbxQexJLAjdLS0Fd198'}]
